content.html: Hello Rowan! Thank you for mentioning me in your weeknotes. I love the style of your blog – simple, colourful, and clear! I wrote a program that sent webmentions to all of the people I had mentioned in my past articles. I had to do this because I didn’t set up auto webmention sending. However, now I am using webmention.app so any mention should be sent automatically. Thanks again for your kind words!
